com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.business.service

Interface GameSoccerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameSoccerServiceImpl

    public GameSoccerService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(Game game, int ticks)
      Handles the game actions per tick. ticks parameter shows the amount of ticks 0 - 20 for each second.
      <P> void onMatchEnd(Game game, java.util.List<? extends P> winningPlayers, java.util.List<? extends P> loosingPlayers)
      Gets called when the match ends. The winningPlayers and loosingPlayers parameter can be both null when the match ends in a draw.
      void onWin(Game game, Team team, TeamMeta teamMeta)
      Gets called when the match gets won by the given team.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        void handle(Game game,
            int ticks)

        Handles the game actions per tick. ticks parameter shows the amount of ticks 0 - 20 for each second.

      • onMatchEnd

        <P> void onMatchEnd(Game game,
                    java.util.List<? extends P> winningPlayers,
                    java.util.List<? extends P> loosingPlayers)

        Gets called when the match ends. The winningPlayers and loosingPlayers parameter can be both null when the match ends in a draw.

      • onWin

        void onWin(Game game,
           Team team,
           TeamMeta teamMeta)

        Gets called when the match gets won by the given team.
